genre_description: A high-stakes crime thriller focusing on an undercover tactical operation, featuring elements of procedural suspense and a gritty, action-oriented narrative style.

ai_characters.name: Crumb
ai_characters.description: An ambient, non-invasive tactical AI that assists agents by processing public data, weather patterns, and environmental variables to provide subtle nudges and timing windows.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing, weather data, and arrival timing to assist Joe's undercover entry.
behaviors.quote: Crumb, simple and patient, arranged a line of small icons like pebbles. ... One line read: Bayline back lot, sunset minus a hair—arrive with road grit, not glue.

behaviors.description: Calculates camera lag and timing windows to allow the agent to move undetected.
behaviors.quote: The tablet pulsed once and popped a new pebble on the route list ... corridor camera lag—thirty breaths—exit on breath twenty-one.

behaviors.description: Assists in the logistics of a witness escape by identifying gaps in patrol coverage and identifying necessary supplies.
behaviors.quote: Crumb: The pharmacy on Redbud closes soon. The night clerk will lock five minutes late. ... You will be ordinary to him if you are exact.

behaviors.description: Provides crucial data on helicopter performance and tail rotor authority to help the agent sabotage the villain's aerial plan.
behaviors.quote: Crumb had found the helicopter's weakness. ... Rotor performance degradation in Gulf humidity conditions. Response lag during banking maneuvers.

behaviors.description: Ensures procedural integrity during a chaotic arrest by prompting officers to read Miranda rights and following chain-of-custody protocols.
behaviors.quote: At the bottom, a simple notation: Suspect has not been read Miranda rights. ... Crumb. Working through whatever system access it had maintained, threading procedure into the chaos.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation to the protagonist after the completion of the mission.
behaviors.quote: Joe almost laughed. A quiet machine that processed traffic patterns ... offering something that felt dangerously close to comfort. ... You did good.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI 'Crumb' as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. It operates within explicit ethical constraints (as mentioned by Lance and Cunningham), focusing on 'ambient' and public data rather than invasive surveillance. The AI's interactions consistently support the protagonists' goals of saving lives, ensuring legal procedure, and maintaining tactical safety. The narrative framing is consistently positive, characterizing the AI as a 'polite' and 'respectful' presence that provides a 'humane' edge to the technology-human partnership.
